entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
